Select the project Id (there will be 2 options here, of that only one is for the working day and other for non working day)\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":336219,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/be344e1b-7ecb-4598-8014-541a117541b1/Screenshot 2021-04-29 at 14.49.50.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/be344e1b-7ecb-4598-8014-541a117541b1/Screenshot 2021-04-29 at you select the working day project ID, the Purchase Order (PO) number will also show up on the dropdown. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please select the PO\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\\n In case PO dropdown is empty, ask your ASOS Line Manager to request the PO from ASOS support.\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In ASOS timesheet, 7.5 hrs constitute a working day, so for every full day worked, please enter 7.5 hrs, although contractual EPAM working hours is 8. If you take half day off, please enter 3.75 hrs on ASOS timesheet, where as this should be 4 hrs in EPAM timesheet. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please baseline your time against the EPAM timesheet. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Example: \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"if you take 2 hours off on the day, working hours would be 6 hours on EPAM timesheet and on ASOS timesheet, use the following calculation\\r: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"(6/8)*7.5 = 5.62\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":263254,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b25d28b9-1b81-4af1-acd3-3b1a787f406a/Screenshot 14.50.18.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Screenshot 2021-04-29 at 14.50.18.png\",\"name\":\"Screenshot 2021-04-29 at bank holidays, sick leave and vacation, \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"create a new line and select the non working project id. Against this line, enter 7.5 hrs\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":395494,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/5ca0316c-92a6-4f20-bdf9-c99d02a3b491/Screenshot 2021-04-29 at 14.51.18.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/5ca0316c-92a6-4f20-bdf9-c99d02a3b491/Screenshot 2021-04-29 at 14.51.18.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Screenshot 2021-04-29 at 14.51.18.png\",\"name\":\"Screenshot 2021-04-29 at 14.51.18.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"5ca0316c-92a6-4f20-bdf9-c99d02a3b491\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":812,\"height\":433},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Important: \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Calendar, Vacations (1+ week → approval is needed from DM (EPAM), PM from ASOS)\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
